Detailed Description

Exception class.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

flusspferd::exception::exception ( char const *  what,
std::string const &  type = "Error" 
) [inline]

Constructor.

If available, this constructor will create an exception containing the last Javascript engine error. Otherwise, it will create an exception of type type.

Parameters:
what The error message.
type The error type (if applicable).

flusspferd::exception::exception ( std::string const &  what,
std::string const &  type = "Error" 
) [inline]

Constructor.

If available, this constructor will create an exception containing the last Javascript engine error. Otherwise, it will create an exception of type type.

Parameters:
what The error message.
type The error type (if applicable).

flusspferd::exception::exception ( value const &  val  ) 

Value constructor.

Will create an exception containing val. The error message will be the string representation of val.

flusspferd::exception::~exception (  )  throw ()

Destructor.

Member Function Documentation

bool flusspferd::exception::empty (  )  const

"Emptiness".

Will return only if the exception contains an exception fetched from the underlying Javascript engine.

Returns:
Whether this exception is "empty".

value flusspferd::exception::val (  )  const

The exception value.

Returns:
The exception value.
